Constipation is a frequent reason for consultation in young children.

This symptom accounts for almost 5% of paediatric consultations in private practice.

Constipation most often appears between the ages of 1 and 4 and can affect up to a third of school-age children.

question.title: What is the typical age range when constipation most often appears in children?
question.description: Constipation is a frequent reason for consultation in young children. This symptom accounts for almost 5% of paediatric consultations in private practice. Constipation most often appears between the ages of ______________ and ______________ and can affect up to a third of school-age children.

option_a.title: 0 and 1
option_a.description: Constipation often appears in infants and toddlers

option_b.title: 1 and 4
option_b.description: Constipation most often appears between the ages of 1 and 4 and can affect up to a third of school-age children

option_c.title: 4 and 6
option_c.description: Constipation often appears in older children and can affect up to a third of school-age children

option_d.title: 6 and 10
option_d.description: Constipation is rare in children under 6 years old

correct_option.description: The correct option is only the lower bound of the age range
